title_full: IOTPERF01-BP01 Optimize for device hardware resources utilization
title: Optimize for device hardware resources utilization
description: Adapt architectural decisions to device hardware resources by optimizing for device hardware resource utilization. Select appropriate algorithms, data structures, and processing approaches that work within the memory, CPU, and power constraints of your IoT devices.

title_full: IOTPERF02-BP01 Implement comprehensive monitoring solutions to collect performance data from your IoT devices
title: Implement comprehensive monitoring solutions to collect performance data from your IoT devices
description: Measure and maintain the performance of your IoT solution by implementing comprehensive monitoring solutions to collect performance data from devices. Monitor key metrics like response times, throughput, and resource utilization.

title_full: IOTPERF02-BP02 Evaluate the runtime performance of your application
title: Evaluate the runtime performance of your application
description: Evaluate the runtime performance of your IoT application by profiling and benchmarking both device-side and cloud-side components. Identify performance bottlenecks and optimize critical paths.

title_full: IOTPERF03-BP01 Add timestamps to each published message
title: Add timestamps to each published message
description: Include auditable metadata in transmitted content by adding timestamps to each published message. Timestamps enable accurate event ordering, latency measurement, and correlation of events across distributed IoT systems.

title_full: IOTPERF04-BP01 Have mechanisms to prioritize specific payload types
title: Have mechanisms to prioritize specific payload types
description: Implement payload filtering or stream prioritization by having mechanisms to prioritize specific payload types. Ensure critical messages like alerts and commands receive priority processing over routine telemetry.

title_full: IOTPERF05-BP01 Identify the ingestion mechanisms that best fit your use case
title: Identify the ingestion mechanisms that best fit your use case
description: Optimize telemetry data ingestion by identifying the ingestion mechanisms that best fit your use case. Choose between MQTT, HTTP, or custom protocols based on device capabilities, data volumes, and latency requirements.

title_full: IOTPERF05-BP02 Optimize data sent from devices to backend services
title: Optimize data sent from devices to backend services
description: Optimize data sent from devices to backend services by implementing data compression, aggregation, and filtering at the edge. Reduce unnecessary data transfer while preserving essential information.

title_full: IOTPERF06-BP01 Store data in different tiers following formats, access patterns and methods
title: Store data in different tiers following formats, access patterns and methods
description: Efficiently make stored data usable by business by storing data in different tiers based on formats, access patterns, and methods. Use hot, warm, and cold storage tiers to balance performance and cost for IoT data.

title_full: IOTPERF07-BP01 Optimize network topology for distributed devices
title: Optimize network topology for distributed devices
description: Provide optimal connectivity for edge devices communicating to cloud infrastructure by optimizing network topology for distributed devices. Consider edge gateways, mesh networks, and regional endpoints to reduce latency.

title_full: IOTPERF07-BP02 Perform timely connectivity verification for devices
title: Perform timely connectivity verification for devices
description: Perform timely connectivity verification for devices to ensure optimal communication paths. Implement health checks and connectivity testing to identify and address network issues proactively.

title_full: IOTPERF08-BP01 Load test your IoT applications
title: Load test your IoT applications
description: Ensure your application operates within its scaling limits by load testing your IoT applications. Simulate expected device loads and peak scenarios to validate system capacity and identify scaling bottlenecks.

title_full: IOTPERF08-BP02 Monitor and manage your IoT service quotas using available tools and metrics
title: Monitor and manage your IoT service quotas using available tools and metrics
description: Monitor and manage your IoT service quotas using available tools and metrics. Track usage against limits and request quota increases before reaching thresholds that could impact operations.

title_full: IOTPERF09-BP01 Have device inventory in the IoT system that centralizes device configuration and diagnostics
title: Have device inventory in the IoT system that centralizes device configuration and diagnostics
description: Maintain visibility over the distributed infrastructure deployed by having a device inventory in the IoT system that centralizes device configuration and diagnostics. Use device registries and fleet indexing to track device status and configuration.
